bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Ralph Cooper Hutchison, December 13, 1940

div1.p: Hench wants to pay for duplicate photographs of Moran and Kissinger. He has not yet received the other photographs or the souvenir booklets from the Lazear memorial event. Hench regrets that there is no photograph of himself receiving his honorary degree [from Washington and Jefferson College].

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Ralph Cooper Hutchison, December 13, 1940
div1.p:
After I added that P.S. on my last note to you, I thought it
was rather childish. I asked Miss Hough to write to the two men if the
photographs were lost. I was afraid that it would appear that I wasn't
brave enough to face them myself. However, my point was that they would
feel that I was careless with their photographs, and didn't deserve another
one.

After rechecking and double checking, every possible place here
they could have been, I find that they simply aren't here, and everything
points to the fact that they were sent with the other photographs. But
that is water over the dam and I am awfully sorry to have caused you so
much trouble. I hate like the devil to have the college pay for these
photographs. I suspect that they won't ask the college to do it, but if
they do, won't you please let me do it? I can assure you I had so much
fun and so much satisfaction out of the whole affair that I will always
be indebted to you and the college.

Being a photographic fiend, I am really sorry that it so happened
that I was the only one not having a photograph taken when you presented the
degree. Did you by any chance tell the photographer, “For Heaven's sake,
don't photograph Hench. We don't want any permanent record of that!”?

I have received the duplicate photographs, but not the others which
Mr. Brewer mentioned (the ones I have not seen). Please be sure to send me
if you can a few copies of the souvenir booklet which you are planning to
get up on the Lazear Memorial. Also did you remember my request that if for
any reason my citation should be published anywhere in your records, please
demote me from president of the All-universe, All-world, All-hemisphere
Rheumatism Association to merely the president of the American Rheumatism
Association.

closer.seg:
P. S. How about joining us for a West Indies vacation, or at least
a Havana vacation in March?
P.S.H.
